com.microsoft.azure

Class DAGraph<T,U extends DAGNode<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.Graph<T,U>
      • com.microsoft.azure.DAGraph<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the data stored in the graph nodes
    U - the type of the nodes in the graph

    public class DAGraph<T,U extends DAGNode<T>>
extends Graph<T,U>
    Type representing a DAG (directed acyclic graph).

    each node in a DAG is represented by DAGNode

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.microsoft.azure.Graph

        graph

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DAGraph(U rootNode)
      Creates a new DAG.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      U getNext()
      Gets next node in the DAG which has no dependency or all of it's dependencies are resolved and ready to be consumed.
      T getNodeData(String key)
      Gets the data stored in a graph node with a given key.
      boolean hasParent() 
      boolean isPreparer() 
      boolean isRootNode(U node)
      Checks whether the given node is root node of this DAG.
      void merge(DAGraph<T,U> parent)
      Merge this DAG with another DAG.
      void prepare()
      Prepares this DAG for traversal using getNext method, each call to getNext returns next node in the DAG with no dependencies.
      void reportedCompleted(U completed)
      Reports that a node is resolved hence other nodes depends on it can consume it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DAGraph

        public DAGraph(U rootNode)
        Creates a new DAG.
        Parameters:
        rootNode - the root node of this DAG

    • Method Detail

      • hasParent

        public boolean hasParent()
        Returns:
        true if this DAG is merged with another DAG and hence has a parent

      • isRootNode

        public boolean isRootNode(U node)
        Checks whether the given node is root node of this DAG.
        Parameters:
        node - the node DAGNode to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the given node is root node

      • isPreparer

        public boolean isPreparer()
        Returns:
        true if this dag is the preparer responsible for preparing the DAG for traversal.

      • merge

        public void merge(DAGraph<T,U> parent)
        Merge this DAG with another DAG.

        This will mark this DAG as a child DAG, the dependencies of nodes in this DAG will be merged with (copied to) the parent DAG

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent DAG

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Prepares this DAG for traversal using getNext method, each call to getNext returns next node in the DAG with no dependencies.

      • getNext

        public U getNext()
        Gets next node in the DAG which has no dependency or all of it's dependencies are resolved and ready to be consumed.
        Returns:
        next node or null if all the nodes have been explored

      • getNodeData

        public T getNodeData(String key)
        Gets the data stored in a graph node with a given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the node
        Returns:
        the value stored in the node

      • reportedCompleted

        public void reportedCompleted(U completed)
        Reports that a node is resolved hence other nodes depends on it can consume it.
        Parameters:
        completed - the node ready to be consumed
